recipeInstructions.@value:
Add 1 package of Sure-Jell to juices and bring to a boil.
Boil for 1 minute and then add sugar.
Boil berries in water for 20 minutes.

Drain and measure juice. Add
juice of lemon and grapefruit. There should be 4 1/2 cups of combined
juices.
Boil to jell, about 2 minutes at a rolling boil.
Pour into prepared sterilized jars, then seal.
